page.description: Delete a CR-LF delimted list of words to the User-defined spellchecker dictionary.

argument.name: word_list_to_delete
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words. Character

page.discussion: The USER_DICTIONARY_DELETE() function deletes a CR-LF delimited list of words from the user dictionary for the Spellchecker.
page.example: dim lst as C lst = sand gravel %str% ? user_dictionary_delete(lst)
